Why doesn't it work on my computer?!:/
I have VLC, I opened the movie in VLC and it started playing. Then I draged the subtitle-file into the VLC player, but then the movie just stopped and it won't play again. I tried to stop the movie before I draged the subtitle-file into it, but that didn't work eighter.
Can anybody help me please?:)
All you have to do is have the sub file in the same folder as the movie and call it the same as the movie, but the sub file has to end at .srt
